name: SenTo
description:
SenTo - 2D Platformer

/!\this game is only playable with an Xbox controller /!\

you can move thanks to the left joystick and dash with LT.

SenTo is the first small game I made, with Quentin Francavilla, during my academic year at Keimyung University in South Korea. You can experience some small bugs with the hitbox or the UI, for exemple. But I intentionally decided to let the game at the stage it was when we finished it, in order to have a memory of what we were capable of doing at this moment. To see how I progressed.

Thanks, Have fun !!

Abdou Sopo twitter - instagram - twitch
